website_summaries.verdict: Not only does it improve brain function, this nootropic contains many other vitamins and minerals, reducing the need to buy multiple bottles of supplements.
pros: Contains natural green tea extract and no caffeine
Great for keeping energy up while working long shifts
ADHD sufferers have taken this with better results than from their prescription medication
Users report better moods and memory
some feel their vision and social skills have improved
cons: the manufacturer recommends taking for at least 2 months to determine efficacy

customer_reviews.title: Helped with Memory and Mood
customer_reviews.text: I have almost finished my first bottle, and I have notice that my cognitive function is definitely better. I'm not struggling to remember words as much, and I seem sharper in general. More surprising, I've noticed my anxiety has gone down lately and I feel much more calm and relaxed. I didn't really put the two together until I happened to read that Brain Boost improves mood on the bottle. It's definitely helping. I'll be buying another bottle.
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Brain Boost Really Worked For Me!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was having trouble remembering things. I shopped on Amazon and found Brain Boost.... I have been on it now for three weeks and I most certainly feel much more clear headed than I have for a very long time!! I plan on continuing to use this product as it has really made a difference in my life so far! Jim
customer_reviews.author: James Sheldon

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: The very first day I was more focused. I could work for hours on a project without drifting to something else. I have also noticed that I am remembering little things better. Like remembering why I walked into the kitchen. I haven't had any undesirable effects. Just can actually remember things now. It has really helped me be more productive at work.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: The fog has lifted
customer_reviews.text: I am about to start my second bottle and will soon be ordering my third. I would have to say that... Bright – Clear – Focused – A bit more alert ... comes to mind when describing the results of Brain Boost. I look forward to taking it each morning. Brain Boost gives me that bit of clarity of mind and allows me to get on with my day, without the fog I have apparently been living in. Thanks Brain Boost!
customer_reviews.author: David Graham

customer_reviews.title: Brain Boost Works!
customer_reviews.text: My husband has TBI and has trouble with his memory and with his brain feeling sluggish. I found Brain Boost and with the good reviews I read I thought Why not? He has been taking it for 2 months and he really sees and feels a difference in his memory and sluggishness. He isn't even taking the maximum dose. I will definitely be ordering more and trying it myself. Thanks Brain Boost!
customer_reviews.author: Susan Wyckoff

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good clean energy. Natural ingredients. Verbal fluency and overall mood improvements.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Side effects
customer_reviews.text: Took the product for 2 weeks and had severe GI side effects. At first I thought I had the stomach flu but it would not go away. I stopped taking it and in a couple days I was feeling much better.
customer_reviews.author: Alice_CA

customer_reviews.title: This is very good brain food for a reasonable price along with multivitamins.
customer_reviews.text: My brain speeds up when I take these. It helps me a lot at work since I have a job that requires a lot of focusing and to be very detail oriented. Also it makes me talk a lot non-stop. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: L. Torregano

customer_reviews.title: I have tried other neutropics and can honestly say i ...
customer_reviews.text: I have tried other neutropics and can honestly say i can tell when i haven't taken my brain boost- brain fog but when i take this supplement i'm much more alert and focused.
customer_reviews.author: leftheartinpittsburgh

customer_reviews.title: Great for 95-year olds!
customer_reviews.text: your mileage may vary but I got this supplement for my 95-year old mother in law who was drifting in and out of "now". I am honestly amazed at the difference 1 week has made. She is clearly much more alert and has been more physically active. Her memory is so bad, I can't make any claims about that aspect but the change has been so substantial that my wife and I are now taking this too. The product is reasonably priced and has good stuff in it, if you are looking for a supplement that actually works, this one is worth a try.
customer_reviews.author: J. Underwood

customer_reviews.title: Brain Boost a fantastic product
customer_reviews.text: I love Brain Boost! My energy level has been great ever since I started taking it. My memory has improved a lot! I had tried other products and did not get the results I was looking for. I can't think of anything I don't like about Brain Boost. I would recommend this product to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Cody

customer_reviews.title: Potent Stuff
customer_reviews.text: There seems to be a wide assortment of nutrients and whatnot in this product but whatever they are, Arazo has hit on a magical blend that simply works wonders. This will remove the "fog", facilitate concise thinking and overall just make you feel better because you are thinking clearly. Works very fast and there isn't a delay while you wait for your system to become saturated. I notice results within 30 minutes and lasts all day.
customer_reviews.author: D. Heyn

customer_reviews.title: he told me that his focus was better, he had clearer thinking
customer_reviews.text: I purchased Brain Boost for my husband who still teaches high school math at age 74 (I need the insurance). From day 1, he told me that his focus was better, he had clearer thinking, and he even remembered the name of a kid from last year. He is very happy with Brain Boost!! Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy M.

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Do not recommend. Gave me terrible headaches. Will NOT buy again. Doesn’t even work.
customer_reviews.author: Razor

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: it does help with depression and it you are constipated it helps right away. However, I have had to change my review, as I broke out in hives and my whole arm was itching. I stopped taking the product and my arm is clearing up and the itching is better. I helped with one thing but it was not worth the hives, whelps and itching.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Comello

customer_reviews.title: Brain Plus actually works
customer_reviews.text: The product really works. Makes me feel sharper than and more focused then ever before
customer_reviews.author: Michael Williams

customer_reviews.title: So far so good.
customer_reviews.text: Im currently 3/4 of my way through my second bottle. I share Brain Plus with my mom who has dementia. Im not a doctor, but i have noticed a difference in her mental capabilities. Sadly there is no cure or miracle pill out there as far as i know. In my personal experience using the daily dosage almost everyday i have noticed an improvement in my ability to process information a bit faster. The biggest improvement i have noticed is that although I was having a mental fog for a while it has seemed to be lifted a bit. These factors alone make this product for its price point worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Clint Girdhari

customer_reviews.title: Brain boost
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product for my daughter. She has adhd. Product worked wonders from the start. She stated that she had a great day at school with no side effects. I took her off the harsh meds because of the side effects. Stumbled upon this shopping for liver cleanse for myself. Definitely pleased with product. Definitely will reorder as well. She takes one pill a day instead of the 2 pills as directed. This product will be used by both of us! I definitely need the boost in the mornings due to my early work schedule.
customer_reviews.author: Kelicia Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: I like the product very much
customer_reviews.text: I like the product very much. It’s given me Clarity I haven’t been as forgetful as I was before. Even if I forget I quickly remember which is so different from before I started taking this product. I think it’s working well for me, which is why I bought a second bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: product made me naseous, could not take it for ...
customer_reviews.text: product made me naseous, could not take it for more than a o couple of days. the return window is past and I totally forgot to send it back.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff
customer_reviews.text: Been using for 1 week now. I chose this one because its stimulant free and has great reviews. I am using this to help ween off of my antidepressant. My memory and focus have rapidly decreased and this does seem to help. I have also not experienced withdrawal symptoms from my antidepressant as I typically do when trying to ween off. Two thumbs up!
customer_reviews.author: jules

customer_reviews.title: fake reviews, does not work
customer_reviews.text: Does not work for me, like other nootropics I have tried. Also, what was the worst though is that when I got the product, it came with a card prompting me to give a good review for a second free bottle!! So, when you see these good reviews, don't trust them because they are highly incentivized.
customer_reviews.author: Angelo

customer_reviews.title: this product works as well as the more expensive "Limitless" product advertised on the radio.
customer_reviews.text: I love how well it works for the money. The more expensive "Limitless" pill had an ingredient that metabolizes into caffeine, so I merely take either a cup of coffee or a caffeine pill (which are very inexpensive) with it and I perks me up and helps with my "chemo fog." I have a spinal cord injury and all the medications I am on leave me in a "brain fog", which is called "chemo fog" when produced my medications. This product helps with that quite a bit, without raising blood pressure of pulse. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: william binder jr

customer_reviews.title: I ordered my 1st bottle in Oct. I started ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered my 1st bottle in Oct. I started by taking 1 cap per day to see if I had any adverse reactions. No side effects other than clearer thinking! I'm looking forward to my next bottle to see the full results.
customer_reviews.author: Leah Bridges

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Change
customer_reviews.text: I was not able to remember common words when talking to others and had to seem confused while I thought for the words. And when I received a new screen for my laptop. I had to send it back because the job was beyond my abilities. Now, after being on BRAIN PLUS for about 60 days , I don't hesitate very often for my words. PLUS, I ordered that replacment screen and installed it like a pro. I'm convinced that Arazo Nutrition BRAIN PLUS works for me. I will continue using the product as long as I am able.
customer_reviews.author: Paul H. Bunyan Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Helps with ADHD!
customer_reviews.text: My son and I take this instead of ADHD meds. Our doctor recommended a similar prescription vitamin but we can't afford it, so we tried this. It's amazing and really helps!! I thought maybe it was psychological but once I ran out without realizing and could tell I wasn't as focused. Figured it out ... need to take it every day! Great company too.
customer_reviews.author: Mart

customer_reviews.title: Loving the "Brain Boost"
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product, where shall I begin? I work full time (third shift) ,while going to school for my MS in Counseling. After using this product for 2 months , I believe I have been able to keep up comfortably with the weekly APA style reports for school and my crazy summer work week schedule (10 days in a row anyone?). My recollection has improved as well as my cognitive processing; which has improved my life incredibly; no longer do I have clouding of consciousness (brain fog) due to the fatigue from lack of sleep and work but my creativity and critical thinking has improved as well. Thank you Arazo for making a quality and affordable product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Seems to work
customer_reviews.text: My daughter had trouble focusing at school this year. She would always get distracted and take so long to get her work done. After taking brain boost, I have seen great improvement. She stays focused at the task at hand and get her work done a lot faster.
customer_reviews.author: Moyzan

customer_reviews.title: It works!! 👍👍
customer_reviews.text: At the beginning I was a little sceptical about this product and after reading some reviews I decided to give it a try. Now after the first bottle Im beginning to see the results. Now keep in mind that this is a slow process and you're not going to find any miracle pill to help you recover your memory but this product definitely helps you a lot. You will start seeing the results after 10 or 15 days in use depending on the person I guess. But something that's for sure is that it works and I definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Mario A.

customer_reviews.title: Headaches
customer_reviews.text: I’m not a fan of low rating but when it comes to medicine, there is no gray area. The headaches these pills gave me are real. After a week, I stopped taking them and dumped them. I’ll take my chances without them.

customer_reviews.title: This works only one day for me n the second ...
customer_reviews.text: This works only one day for me n the second day, it makes my heart pounding fast as hell, I'm going to ask for a refund.

customer_reviews.text: Dont take this during the day at work, you will be more spaced out,

customer_reviews.title: Smart idea: don't buy
customer_reviews.text: Still as forgetful and confused as I was before I took these. Save your money

customer_reviews.text: Honestly, I’ve tried a couple different NZT but I’ve stuck to this one. It has a good balance of components that gives me a noticeable uptick in my mental abilities.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I don't see any positive efficacy, but money back guarantee!
customer_reviews.text: I didn't notice if my memory is any better, but I sure can't sleep at night if I take it in the morning. Edit: I originally had a two star review, but their customer service refunded my money and offered me a different product without any prompts! I have three other products of theirs that work great, no reason to not give it a shot!
customer_reviews.author: Al

customer_reviews.title: It does help!
customer_reviews.text: My 14 year old has pretty bad ADD so I bought this one for her to try and another brand for me to try. I sent mine back as it caused significant fatigue. My kiddo had tried traditional meds which totally changed her personality, she did horrible on them. This stuff is NO miracle BUT I am happy to report that she DOES notice a difference. Heck they might be miraculous if she would take them everyday haha. She has more focus with these, no crazy side effects, no crash at the end of the day. I'm happy we found something that helps even a little. I will continue to purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Special K

customer_reviews.title: This product is amazing and I recommend it completely
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing and I recommend it completely. It takes the place of chemical based medication. I give it 5 stars. 🌟🌟🌟🌟🌟

customer_reviews.title: IMPROVEMENT WITHIN A FEW WEEKS
customer_reviews.text: Being 72 yrs old, things become fuzzy sometime so I decided to give this a try. About half way thru, taking one in the morning, one at night, I started to notice thinking about past, recalling names and event I had long forgotten. Also seeming my focus advanced. I will continue product to maintain my edge in the business world.
customer_reviews.author: Peter P. Boron

customer_reviews.title: Hid my review because it wasn't five stars
customer_reviews.text: Does really seem to help my memory and I do notice a difference when I take it. Three instead of five stars because when I take it in the morning I notice it causes my stomach to hurt for a few hours and they hid my original review

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been looking for a cognitive supplement for a while. I’ve done the lions mane and a few other things but This one seems to work. I work all day then I change clothes and go to school all night till 10pm. So I wasn’t really retaining much. I started to use these while I study and took them before exams, and it’s almost like I can retain a lot more information without the overload feeling. Great product, will continue to buy.
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: I have been using this item for a week and ...
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this item for a week and I am very hopeful, at 71, I worry about forgetting important committments or conversations. I am going to continue with this product at least a couple of months. I feel it is helpful and am looking forward to being a little sharper than before. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Star

customer_reviews.title: Seems to work for me
customer_reviews.text: I am in my early 40s and noticed that I was having name retrieval problems that seemed crazy for someone so relatively young. I took this product for five months and felt like it was helping. I then took the last month off to see if it was the product or some other change in my life. Definitely felt the name retrieval problems return. I am going to keep this on my subscribe and save list for sure. I gave it four stars because it's not a miracle, but I do see a noticeable change.
customer_reviews.author: Mom of 3

customer_reviews.title: Not a miracle drug but it helps :)
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't sure if this was going to work at all and once I started taking it for a couple of months still wasn't completely sold. So I tried another brand. Meh (didn't like). Life got busy and I forgot to take this supplement for over a month. I just started taking it again this week and I can honestly say that in combination with regular sleep I can really tell a difference. Energy levels are up, as well as my ability to function all day.
customer_reviews.author: Kell_Phx

customer_reviews.title: Just What We Were Looking For!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my son as I felt it was time to take him off his ADHD medication but he still needed a little "Boost". This is in no way a replacement for a prescription medication but we found after just one month of use that it worked just as well for him and seemed to last longer! My only issue is I did not order a second bottle! My son disliked the taste of the pills but it helped him stay focused through semester tests and his daily activities. I would recommend giving Brain Boost a try!
customer_reviews.author: Klpernick

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Took about three week to see results. But then I noticed a significant difference. My sleep greatly improved. My focus is better. I’m truly impressed by this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product, not as effective as I was hoping for but definitely well worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: The product is worth the money. It did help improve my memory slightly and make me a bit less foggy, however, it did not really seem to improve my focus as much as I had hoped. I would rate this product 3.8 stars only because with some other nootropics I have tried in the past I noticed a slightly quicker and more noticeable difference than I did with this particular brand. However, I do wish that I would have taken it a little bit more consistently as I believe this could have been the reason why the product was slightly less effective than I would have liked.
customer_reviews.author: Ania Johnson

customer_reviews.title: It works!!!
customer_reviews.text: A couple years ago I was looking for supplement that would help me be able to concentrate throughout the day. I tried some of the better known ones which did not work for me. Brain Plus had good reviews so I tried it & it worked!! My job was quite taxing on the brain. I was able to stay focused on my work throughout the day! I highly recommend this supplement!!
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: I have a pretty bad memory
customer_reviews.text: I work a lot, and I need to brainstorm on a daily basis. Unfortunately, I have a pretty bad memory, and I always feel annoyed by it. Since I got some other supplements from this brand and I wanted to give a try on this. What I have noticed was I definitely feel more energetic, and I can concentrate on work more. So far, I really love this one.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Does it work
customer_reviews.text: I just started to use this product, I have used a few before this one, I am usually involved in several tasks at the same time and so far this product is helping me to focus.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Nootropic Supplement!
customer_reviews.text: I recently started my MRI Physics class and started taking these in conjunction with the class. The results of have been nothing short of spectacular! I’ve earned an A on all of my quizzes so far and my memory and recall are noticeably improved! Must buy if you’re in school!
customer_reviews.author: Konnor C

customer_reviews.title: Fast acting and great
customer_reviews.text: I usually take SAM-E , L -Theanine or Acetyl L Tyrosine when I get the blues,( not all at the same time). They work but im always searching for some thing better. Within 5 minutes of taking this I knew it worked. My mood lifted and i set about doing chores and organizing. I feel more energetic and focused, hopefully I will be able to sleep later on.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: This product has been a blessing to me!
customer_reviews.text: This is my third order placed. I started feeling the results in about my second week. It improved my "brain fog" and I can truly say my focus and feeling of well being has improved. I work in the medical field in a very high volume office. Dealing with patients requires extreme focus and accuracy. Done! I can truly say this product works. Give it time and watch the results. I have also referred my coworkers to try Brain Boost. Thank you Maribel
customer_reviews.author: MARIBEL ROSA

customer_reviews.title: I can feel the difference
customer_reviews.text: I don't use these as consistently as I know I should. However I can tell a difference with my concentration, attention, and productivity come 3 am in my downtime at work. I am an night shift RN. A little caffeine and dose of brain. I have no problem getting my stock and option trading research done for the days ahead after being up 20+ hours
customer_reviews.author: Laney

customer_reviews.title: Good for relief of brain fog
customer_reviews.text: Noticed after 2-3 days that my brain fog had cleared. Stopped taking my regular multivitamins since Brain Plus includes many of them in addition to brain function ingredients.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Boost through that next shift
customer_reviews.text: If you looking for a way to get an boost through the day... Go no future this product will give you the stead energy to get through shift after shift!!!! Not much of a come down either!!
customer_reviews.author: Honest, Accurate, Reviewing

customer_reviews.title: Glad I found this - Thanks Arazo.
customer_reviews.text: Went to a technical bootcamp some 96 hours in 8 days. A couple of days were 9:00am to 4:00am. Two tabs twice a day with reasonable meals and I felt very focused. Not excited, not like caffeine, there was no spike, no crash. Just a consistent focus and alertness. It really helped when others were dropping out. Also I found that I could fall asleep rather quickly, an extra bonus!
customer_reviews.author: Tom J.

customer_reviews.title: Brain Boost is a compound supplement. It's not a fix all or a cure all.
customer_reviews.text: Brain Boost is a compound supplement. It's not a fix all or a cure all. I'm skeptical of placebo effects and fake truth, but I have taken Brain Boost and have noticed a positive change in my memory and test scores. This was part of my survival kit for my AP Exams and it worked well over weeks of taking the pills on a regular basis. I would continually buy in the future as I feel the product does as stated. It won't make you mega-mind but it'll help.
customer_reviews.author: Fab

customer_reviews.title: New to Nootropics
customer_reviews.text: I am new to nootropics but I was searching for certain supplements. Brain plus had what I needed so I gave it a try. I can feel the affects in my concentration and calmness. I feel I can get into that work flow state much easier when taking brain plus. I think this will be a constant in my supplement regimen.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon_User

customer_reviews.title: Increased libido
customer_reviews.text: After using this product, I experienced an increase of libido to the extent that I considered it made me less intelligent. Upon further thought, I realized that I became more of a realist about increasing the probability of my sexual fantasies happening outside of my imagination. I thus now think these pills help intelligence, and that if I have a problem, the problem is my sexual fantasies, which should be minimizable by eliminating testosterone.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Gerads

customer_reviews.title: It really works!
customer_reviews.text: This supplement does what it says! I have been using vitamins, amino acids, herbs and other natural supplements for many years and at least for me, the effects are usually pretty marginal--there's no night and day difference. But this supplement is a different story. I could not believe how effective it was. I have ADHD and this made a huge difference in my focus and even my energy level. I will say that after a while of taking it every day the effect is not as noticeable, however, I notice if I don't take it. I recommend this 100% to anyone who has issues like ADHD, brain fog, low energy, etc. It really works.
customer_reviews.author: Misty

customer_reviews.title: GREAT STUFF
customer_reviews.text: When I purchased this product I was a little uncertain it would work. After a week or so you can tell the difference. I feel more focused and able to do more at once than I could before. I Love this! Will buy again!

customer_reviews.title: It works !!!
customer_reviews.text: At age 62 and after some health issues my memory was truly concerning for me in my work place SO I LOOKED FOR SOME HELP HERE ! Been using "Brain Plus" for 2 months and its been amazing to experience the results at home as well as in my work place at the hospital !!! Thank You so very much - Minister Craig "MC" Barnaby

customer_reviews.title: Result as promised!
customer_reviews.text: This is only my first bottle but I feel the effect already. This supplement gives you result as promised: mental alertness, focus and clarify, supports memory and positive mood. Will definitely reorder for future brain maintenance.
customer_reviews.author: Yosep Tjahja

customer_reviews.title: Amazing brain booster
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to buy this product at first because I've tried other memory pills from gnc and nothing seems to help my memory. But im glad i bought it. I suffered with mild forgetfulness due to depression. But since I've been taking this brain plus, my memory is back. I have energy because my memory is not as foggy. My concentration is better. I got a 100% on my written test job. I can clearly focus without juggling multi other things in my head. The smell and after taste is not too bad. The capsule is kinda big. But for the result, I'll definitely buy this product again.

customer_reviews.title: Recommend for anyone considering Electroshock therapy
customer_reviews.text: I had Electroconvulsive therapy, ECT a few months ago. It left me with headaches every single day. After doing some research I found that most ECT patients are left with depleted vitamin levels so I decided to give this Brain Boost a try. I highly recommend this as it’s helped my headaches so much that I don’t get them nearly as often!!
customer_reviews.author: Christin Fern

customer_reviews.title: It does not make me jittery or anything like that, nor does it bother my stomach
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been enjoying brain boost, 2 tabs a day for a few weeks now. It does not make me jittery or anything like that, nor does it bother my stomach. What I have noticed, however, is more mental clarity, mental energy, and precision with language my language skills. Try it out!

customer_reviews.title: Definate mood stabilizer. Helped me get off antidepressants!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this product. I recently discovered that my antidepressants was causing weight gain and were slowly starting to not work so well. Well I decided to stop them cold Turkey and replace with this. It's actually working better and has lots of vitamins so I dont have to take so many pills. It has also aided in weight loss which is a plus for me because the other antidepressants caused me to gain weight. I feel so much better just after almost a week that I'm gonna keep this up. Goodbye prescription drugs!
customer_reviews.author: Patsey

customer_reviews.title: Love It !!! Will not be without it!!

I was starting to notice I was having a harder time in recalling names and words while I was speaking to someone. I was starting to get anxiety when I had to speak to people because I could not recall my words. I was looking for a product that would help with my memory and I am so glad I ordered this one! I also seen an improvement in my over all mood!

My usual ADHD symptoms, have abated to a recognizable degree, and I just feel generally sharper---I notice that I'm thinking with depth when I'm teaching and also taking the time to make definite contact with specific individuals. It's a subtle effect, but I've been consciously aware of a difference for a couple weeks now.

customer_reviews.title: I'm glad I did

I'm glad I did, i have noticed more cognition and abiliary to track conversation and discussions better. It's still relatively new to my system, but in an effort monitor the effect I've ordered another bottle to observe if this is just placebo effect experienced in the first month and will report back to see if the perceived cognitive benefit is still there.
customer_reviews.author: Vincent Allen

customer_reviews.title: I've been using Prevagen with reasonably good results. I decided to stop the Prevagen and ...
customer_reviews.text: I've been using Prevagen with reasonably good results. I decided to stop the Prevagen and give brain boost a try since Brain Boost is less expensive. I found I was making all kinds of cognitive errors and having memory problems. I went back to Prevagen and things cleared up beautifully.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Ann Hoobyar

customer_reviews.title: Not a good product for me
customer_reviews.text: Not really a fan. I feel a bit jittery after taking this and get quite hungry. My energy levels and workouts have actually decreased since starting to take these pills. And then at the end of the day I feel exhausted and mentally drained. I purchased because of the great reviews, but I guess everyone has a different reaction. I’m not too happy with the effects and as a result have discontinued my use after about 5 days.
customer_reviews.author: Jkhab

customer_reviews.title: Premium Brain Function Supplement
customer_reviews.text: This is my second day taking Premium Brain Function and I know is quite early but I feel my cognitive is getting slight better. I’m studying for an upcoming exam. So far so good, will become loyal to this product , and I do like the price .
customer_reviews.author: Yvette

customer_reviews.title: First I would like to mention the previous experiences that I have had ...
customer_reviews.text: First I would like to mention the previous experiences that I have had with this particular product. I have tested this particular product for a month now and I haven't taken products that have the similar ingredients or concept. I know that if you are on a routine of a diet or chemical and you switch that routine or normal state you are bound to feel something different and this product absolutely proceeded to do such. I felt more clarity as that is what I was expecting!!
customer_reviews.author: Samuel Baker

customer_reviews.title: Half dose works well for me
customer_reviews.text: I'm 42 and showing signs of mental aging. This product makes me feel more focused, reduces 'mental fog', and helps me focus for longer (I'm a software developer and often need to focus intently for hours at a time). I tend to be a bit hypomanic, (insomnia, etc.) and this product worsens it, so I take only a half dose (one capsule), about mid-morning and it works well for me.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin Langton

customer_reviews.title: Clearer thinking
customer_reviews.text: I suffered a major stroke when i was 34 years of age. I have tried many different pills (vitamins) over the years by all these companies who claim to help your brain. Nothing! Then i tried this bottle, did not notice anything for a couple of weeks. Then i started to have my head clear up. Not alot, but i was able to think better with a more clear mind. I recomend this product. Perhaps there is something better down the road.
customer_reviews.author: Macaw Squawker

customer_reviews.title: I can get more done!
customer_reviews.text: I am 68 y/o. I have been taking this supplement for approximately 3 weeks. Tried one pill....no perceivable difference. Taking two as per instructions really helps. I am more focused and energetic. Don't have as many senior moments. Will recommend to friends.
customer_reviews.author: Diah

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Although I didn't experience a significant difference with this product, I understand every person is different. However a BioScience rep contacted me to help me find something that would work for me; and that I appreciate!
customer_reviews.author: William Duenas Delgado

customer_reviews.title: Some improvements already after a short time use
customer_reviews.text: It's still too early to do a complete report, but I do have noticed some improvements already. For example, I more easily recall names of people back from my early days (I'm 72). Still a while back, I had to spend some time trying to figure out many names by going through, in my mind, the entire alphabet, until a "light bulb" switched on.
customer_reviews.author: SOR

customer_reviews.title: Sharp focus
customer_reviews.text: I took this product for a whole month and noticed how focused I was, I have issues staying focused regularly. With the help of this product I have managed to control my moods and focus. I am not diagnosed with ADHD but I know that I have so much Energy that I cannot remain calm sometimes but with this product I am able to control my energy much better
customer_reviews.author: Yesenia

customer_reviews.title: Better focus, and information retention.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this after success using Arazos 5-HTP supplements. I saw noticeable improvement in memory, and overall clarity at work. I recommend starting with a low dosage and increasing it every week until you feel comfortable with the results. Definitely helps me remember things throughout the day, and focus on tasks.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: I am very optimistic....
customer_reviews.text: I am very optimistic for the effects of this products. I have only recently began using it. (and yes, I am being given a free bottle for the review). I did a lot of research before choosing this brand. At age 57, I am looking to improve many things about the operation of my brain. If this product fails to meet my expectations in the future, I will amend my review.
customer_reviews.author: CamelLot

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with your "Brain Plus" product. I was having some physiological depression and ordered your product on a hunch that it might be the answer to my mild depression symptoms. Sure enough, your product has made the difference for me and I plan to keep it available at all times. I highly recommend this product!!!
customer_reviews.author: Larrine Valero

customer_reviews.title: Gave up
customer_reviews.text: I started off taking this since March of of 2019. It’s currently the end of October 2019. So I’ve Ben using them. I definitely can tell the clarity of this supplement works. Now memory it don’t really help as much. Also focusing. I don’t know if I got immune to it. But it’s not working like it used too. Also I get nauseous now with it. So I decided to to stop using and now I’m taking something else. I’m a Pre-Nursing student so I need this for my anatomy classes. But it doesn’t help either memory much.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: I've only used one bottle of Brain Plus and have ...
customer_reviews.text: I've only used one bottle of Brain Plus and have not seen much improvement, but it may be that it is too soon. I'll try another bottle and see if there is more improvement.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Try half before you take the whole pill
customer_reviews.text: It was too much for me...made me super jittery. Take half a pill to try first to see how you feel before taking a whole one. Great product I just feel if I’m gonna be taking it I can’t take more than half a pill at a time. It’s kinda difficult to do half since they are capsules with powder inside, but it’s doable.
customer_reviews.author: ChinaDoll

customer_reviews.title: Like the Results!
customer_reviews.text: I started taking two tablets in the morning several months ago. My husband is taking one daily. We are 68& 69 years old. We are very healthy,, but have trouble being as focused as before. We would not miss a day,, because we notice a difference in our alertness and memory. See review and other info on posting to Seller
customer_reviews.author: Susiejay

customer_reviews.title: Focus without jitteriness
customer_reviews.text: I began almost immediately to feel more focus and clarity on my work without the jitteriness of caffeine. The more I took it, the greater the result. I’m hooked on this now because I can choose whether to have coffee or tea if I want the added boost without having to worry about what time I use this product. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Tina Grassi

customer_reviews.title: Brain Plus  Is For Real
customer_reviews.text: I am 71 years Young and I just finished my First Bottle of Brain Plus and It Does what It says it Will Do. Since taking this I have better Memory and more Energy and I Sleep Better. Can't Say More About Brain Plus It's Real Good. Thank You Dolores
customer_reviews.author: deedee47

customer_reviews.title: e.not as good as I thought
customer_reviews.text: When purchases this supplement it appeared to have a fairly good rating. This persuaded me to give it a try. However, I am very disappointed with the output. My memory function did not improve a bit. I would not recommend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: caleb Page

customer_reviews.title: Still waiting for results
customer_reviews.text: I’ve not seen results yet, but haven’t even been taking the product a full month. A 2 or 3 month trial is probably necessary for a fair review.
customer_reviews.author: Amy C

customer_reviews.title: Wanting to improve memory
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product for my husband, who has pretty bad dementia. I was hoping it would improve his memory/thinking a little but after taking one bottle, I can't see any difference. He retains very little current information at this point, gets very confused at times. Yes, it has good vitamins in it but I can't speak for any of the other ingredients.
customer_reviews.author: Del Humphrey

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Good product. It helps combat mental fatigue when sleep deprived. It gives a nice subtle cognitive boost.
customer_reviews.author: kitkat

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Product
customer_reviews.text: I am 51 years old and recently started a new job. I was having trouble focusing and learning the new software and thought a brain supplement would help. What a difference Brain Plus makes!!!! I can remember to complete tasks at a later time when I am interrupted and pulled in a different direction throughout the day. Brain Plus has made all the difference! My brain feels less foggy and sharper than it has in years. This product works so well for me!
customer_reviews.author: Jesus Saves

customer_reviews.title: Helped improve my memory and mental state
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for a multi-vitamin that would help my mental state by providing key nutrition to my brain. Started taking Brain Plus about 4 months ago. My wife has remarked on how my memory is better, and I have been feeling more positive and happy on a consistent basis. I think using this product has helped my brain get what it needs to function well.
customer_reviews.author: MLC

customer_reviews.title: Great for a clear mind and better reaction time.
customer_reviews.text: I have used brain boost for 1 month and just finished my first bottle and have already received my second bottle and definitely can tell a difference. I have adhd and can’t afford insurance right now so I’m not on any medicine and I decide to add this to my daily vitamins and definitely can tell a difference on my reaction time and thinking clear. How can you go wrong with good vitamins and brain boosters.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Take with food!!
customer_reviews.text: I like it! I don’t know if it is the placebo effect but I do feel more sharp and my mind seems clear and focused when I take this. The only thing is that if I don’t eat food with this supplement I get a super upset stomach. If I have food in my stomach or take this with breakfast I don’t have issues
customer_reviews.author: kassidy

customer_reviews.title: Horrific Taste and Smell
customer_reviews.text: The smell and taste of these pills are truly vile. I gagged and nearly threw up. That was the first day, the second day I tried holding my nose, still a terrible experience.
customer_reviews.author: D. K. CA

customer_reviews.title: Brain Plus Really Works!
customer_reviews.text: This is the third product I have tried, and I have found it to be the best! I noticed surprising results almost immediately. I play "Words with Friends." When I would find a word to move to another location to determine where I would get a higher score, I would have forgotten the first score. Sometimes, I would even forget the words giving the highest score. I became frustrated and decided to try a different product. That is when I discovered Brain Plus and will re-order. I am so pleased and have told others about it.
customer_reviews.author: Forestine Strong Venson

product_meta.title: Premium Brain Function Supplement – Memory, Focus, Clarity – Nootropic Booster with DMAE, Bacopa Monnieri, L-Glutamine, Multi Vitamins, Multi Minerals - Arazo Nutrition
feature_bullets: ★ SCIENTIFICALLY FORMULATED – We carefully combined just the right amount of 41 ingredients into a premium formula designed to boost your focus, memory, concentration and clarity. Perfect for college students, busy moms and aging seniors over 50.

★ FOCUS, MEMORY & CLARITY – Brain Plus is an all-natural Nootropic, formulated to help support memory and cognition. The perfect blend of ingredients will increase oxygen and circulation in the brain, brain cells and neurons. You will remember more easily and think better without brain fog or stress

★ STRESS & MOOD SUPPORT- Designed to increase your mental performance, promote positive mood, increase natural energy and ramp up your full mental potential. Feel your mind re-energize, combat stress, helping you stay alert and focused on your most important tasks. Brain function booster at its best!

★ CONVENIENT ONCE DAILY DOSE – We included DMAE, Bacopa, L-Glutamine, Gaba, Grape Seed, Olive Leaf, Cinnamon, Phosphatidylserine, Multivitamins and more. No more clutter in your cabinets and countertops with several bottles. Brain Plus is all you need, once a day. We combined 41 herbs and multivitamins into one powerful daily dose.
★ RELIABLE – Made in a GMP Certified Facility in America and third party tested for purity.
